html:
Photo Credit: Rina Bach @rinaback | Instagram

Fashion influencers often set trends and inspire us with their style, but Rina Bach is taking it a step further with her latest IKEA hack. She recently shared a clever way to organize her sunglasses that’s both practical and stylish.

The Struggle: Sunglasses Everywhere

Like many of us, Rina found herself dealing with a bit of a mess when it came to her sunglasses. “My sunglasses have been messing around in cabinets, drawers, bags, etc.,” she mentioned.

If you’ve ever dug through a pile of accessories looking for that perfect pair of shades, you know the struggle is real. Rina realized she needed a dedicated spot for her sunglasses—not just for looks, but to keep things organized.

Sunglasses Meet the LUSTIGT Wall Shelf

Enter the LUSTIGT wall shelf from IKEA’s kids’ section. It might seem like a random choice, but that’s precisely what IKEA hacking is.

Instead of using the shelves in a playful “Donkey Kong” style which IKEA recommends, Rina assembled the shelves in a straight line for storage on both sides of the ledge.

She then gave this $9.99 shelf a little makeover by painting it white with some leftover paint. When done, Rina installed it on the wall near the exit, making it perfect for grabbing her sunglasses before heading out the door. “Think I’m a damn genius if I do say so myself,” she joked in her post, and we can’t disagree.

Chic and Organized Sunglass Stand

Her sunglasses now have a stylish new designated rack, adding a cute touch to her room. Who knew a kids’ shelf could look so chic?

But I Only Have 1 Pair Of Sunglasses?

No problem. This hack isn’t just for sunglasses. You can use the shelf to display other accessories like jewelry, as a key holder, create a home for LEGO minifigs, or even display small plants. Adapt this idea to help you declutter your small items and turn a simple shelf into a stylish display for whatever you want to showcase.

Follow @rinabach on Instagram for more fashion tips.

Other Sunglasses Rack Hacks You May Like

Trivet To Sunglass Display Rack

I needed a quick and affordable solution to hang my sunglasses, and an IKEA hack did the trick! I used 3M Command hooks (which don’t damage the apartment walls) along with a repurposed IKEA LÄMPLIG trivet (cooling rack).

Sunglass Organizer Holder

This was incredibly easy to make. I took a small board, attached two METRIK handles to it, and hung it up—now it’s the perfect spot for my sunglasses.

(Update: METRIK handles are discontinued. We recommend handles with thinner profiles like the NYDALA and BORGHAMN to recreate this DIY sunglass holder.)
